de.lambeck.pned.application.actions

Class ActionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lambeck.pned.application.actions.ActionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IActionManager

    public class ActionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IActionManager
    Manager for AbstractAction and their "enabled" state.
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

      • updateZValueActions

        public void updateZValueActions(IGuiElement element)
        Description copied from interface: IActionManager
        Enables or disables all AbstractAction that depend on the currently selected element or the element at the popup menu location.
        Specified by:
        updateZValueActions in interface IActionManager
        Parameters:
        element - The IGuiElement that is currently selected or at the popup menu location, or null = no element selected and no element at the popup menu location
